sentences.english: Objective To study on the artificial culture technology of Radix stephaniae tetrandra S.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究粉防己野生變家種的技術。

sentences.english: Drying temperature was one of the most important factors that would affect the properties of edible wheat gluten films.
sentences.chinese: 乾燥溫度是影響谷朊粉可食性膜性能的一個重要因素。

sentences.english: An overlay welding electrode without mineral powder (such as, slagforming medium, etc.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了無造渣劑等礦石粉的耐磨堆焊電焊條。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a wheat germ nutrient flour and its preparation method.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種麥胚營養粉及其製備方法。

sentences.english: Technology of instant arrowhead(Sagittaria sagittrifolia)powder was studied in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 研究了速溶慈姑粉的生產工藝。

sentences.english: To determine the remnant contend of triadimefon of wheat, the GC was used.
sentences.chinese: 採用氣相色譜法測定小麥中粉鏽寧殘留量。

sentences.english: They powdered it to prevent further harm.
sentences.chinese: 他們給它抹上粉，防止進一步破壞。

sentences.english: The paper explored the manufacturing process of substitute wollastonite flour for barium sulfide to produce the alkyd putty.
sentences.chinese: 探討了用硅灰石粉代替硫酸鋇製造醇酸膩子。

sentences.english: I bread the fish before I cook it.
sentences.chinese: 我在烹調魚之前會先把它裹上面包粉。

sentences.english: Season with salt, lemon juice, olive oil, cumin powder and white pepper powder.
sentences.chinese: 用食鹽，檸檬汁，孜然粉，橄欖油和胡椒粉調味。

sentences.english: The blast furnace slag is grinded to have the granularity the same as that of the cement.
sentences.chinese: 高爐礦渣粉需要磨細，粒度與水泥粒度相同。

sentences.english: Control of root mealy bugs is accomplished with soil drenches with an insecticide.
sentences.chinese: 根部粉蚧的控制是在土壤噴灑殺蟲劑時完成的。

sentences.english: The soluble dietary fiber is the konjac flour or sodium alginate powder.
sentences.chinese: 可溶性膳食纖維爲魔芋精粉或海藻酸鈉粉。

sentences.english: My three-month-old baby is drinking milk powder now.
sentences.chinese: 孩子現在三個月大，我一直給他餵奶粉。

sentences.english: Mix the sugar and jelly powder for the coconut pudding.
sentences.chinese: 把椰子布丁中的砂糖與果凍粉混合。
